title: Twitter Clone
description: Twitter Clone web application developed using PHP, JavaScript and MySQL Database. This web application include all the basic functionalities used in the twitter

title: Quizzlet Prototype
description: Quizzlet is a prototype web application developed using JavaEE (JSP and JSF) with MySQL Database. This web application allows user to create and take quizzes. JSF pages to login and create new users

title: NBCC Staff Wellness App
description: This is a group project developed and deployed in both web and hybrid mobile applications. I have primarily developed mobile application functionalities using React Native and APIs using Nodejs, MySQL, and AWS.
